title: Semi-supervised Label Generation for 3D Multi-modal MRI Bone Tumor Segmentation
details: A Curto-Vilalta, B Schlossmacher, C Valle, A Gersing… - Journal of Imaging …, 2025
abstract: Medical image segmentation is challenging due to the need for expert annotations and the variability of these manually created labels. Previous methods tackling label variability focus on 2D segmentation and single modalities, but reliable 3D multi …
